mapper.select: SELECT p.uid, p.`name` FROM period p LEFT JOIN chapter c on c.uid=p.chapter_id WHERE c .uid = #{uid} and c .tenant_id =#{tenant_id}

SELECT p.uid, cg.play_type_id, p.`name`, p.video_file, p.`begin`, p.over, p.time_length, cg.content FROM period p LEFT JOIN chapter cer on p.chapter_id=cer.uid LEFT JOIN course_pkg cg on cer.course_id=cg.uid where p.uid=#{uid} and p.tenant_id =#{tenant_id} and cg.status="1"
